item.description: I would like to lead a walk at Bare Cove on Saturday January 15th at 9 AM. I am having a party that afternoon and I need to make sure my pups are good and tired! I will be at the front gate at 9 AM sharp and I am going to do the conservatory loop twice.
item.how_to_find_us: Emily will be waiting inside the fire gate at the parking lot

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: January at Bare Cove
